description.value:
Prerequisites @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.4QFElZoWjg1X0vsg]{Archer Dedication}

You are a dynamo with the crossbow.

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to damage with @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.62nnVQvGhoVLLl2K]{Crossbows}.

If the crossbow is a simple weapon, also increase the damage die size for your attacks made with that crossbow by one step .As normal, this damage die increase canâ€™t be combined with other abilities that alter the weapon damage die (such as the ranger feat @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.CpjN7v1QN8TQFcvI]{Crossbow Ace}).
